title: Life in the high Andes
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Andes Region - Rural conditions
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/South America - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Indians of South America - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Peru - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Indians of South America - Peru
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Andes Region - Rural conditions
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Village communities
description: Explains how life in high mountain regions in affected by altitude and climate. Pictures an Indian family living in a mountain valley of Peru, and shows how farming, grazing, and weaving are important to their lives. Discusses the influences of the ancient Incan civilization on these people and presents a view on market day in the village.
